channel.title: List of Secure Computation Papers
channel.description: A list of papers on IACR eprint on the topic of secure computation.

item.title: Order-C Secure Multiparty Computation for Highly Repetitive Circuits
item.description: Gabrielle Beck and Aarushi Goel and Abhishek Jain and Gabriel Kaptchuk

item.title: zkHawk: Practical Private Smart Contracts from MPC-based Hawk
item.description: Aritra Banerjee and Michael Clear and Hitesh Tewari

item.title: Almost-Asynchronous MPC under Honest Majority, Revisited
item.description: Matthieu Rambaud and Antoine Urban

item.title: Over 100x Faster Bootstrapping in Fully Homomorphic Encryption through Memory-centric Optimization with GPUs
item.description: Wonkyung Jung and Sangpyo Kim and Jung Ho Ahn and Jung Hee Cheon and Younho Lee

item.title: On using the same key pair for Ed25519 and an X25519 based KEM
item.description: Erik Thormarker

item.title: Improved Circuit Compilation for Hybrid MPC via Compiler Intermediate Representation
item.description: Daniel Demmler and Stefan Katzenbeisser and Thomas Schneider and Tom Schuster and Christian Weinert

item.title: LogStack: Stacked Garbling with $O(b \log b)$ Computation
item.description: David Heath and Vladimir Kolesnikov

item.title: CryptGPU: Fast Privacy-Preserving Machine Learning on the GPU
